card.name: Dunlending Rampager
card.text: When you play this minion, the Free Peoples player may discard 2 cards from hand to discard him.

card.name: Dunlending Renegade
card.text: When you play this minion, the Free Peoples player may discard 2 cards from hand to discard him.

card.name: Leaping Blaze
card.text: Shadow: Spot 3 {Dunland} minions to shuffle your hand into your draw deck and draw 8 cards. The Free Peoples player may discard 3 cards from hand to prevent this.

card.name: Wild Men of the Hills
card.text: The twilight cost of this minion is -2 during the skirmish phase. When you play this minion, the Free Peoples player may discard 4 cards from hand to discard it.

card.name: Baruk Khazâd
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf to wound a minion. You may take the next maneuver action.

card.name: Defending the Keep
card.text: Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf to draw a card or play a {Dwarven} condition from your discard pile.

card.name: ·Gimli, Skilled Defender
card.text: Damage +1. Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may wound a minion assigned to skirmish an unbound companion.

card.name: ·Horn of Helm
card.text: Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf companion to make each minion at a battleground lose all damage bonuses until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·More to My Liking
card.text: Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Stack the top card from your draw deck here (limit once per phase). Maneuver: Spot a Dwarf and discard a card stacked on a {Dwarven} condition to take a Free Peoples card stacked here into hand.

card.name: ·Balglin, Elven Warrior
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. While skirmishing a wounded minion, Balglin takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase.

card.name: Break the Charge
card.text: Archery: Exert 3 Elf companions to make the fellowship archery total +2.

card.name: ·Legolas' Sword
card.text: Bearer must be Legolas. Each time the fellowship moves, you may spot a wounded minion to heal Legolas.

card.name: ·Taurnil, Sharp-eyed Bowman
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. While Taurnil bears a ranged weapon, the twilight cost of each Shadow possession is +2, and he does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: That Is No Orc Horn
card.text: Regroup: Spot 3 Elf companions to heal a companion and liberate a site.

card.name: ·Birchseed, Tall Statesman
card.text: Unhasty. Assignment: Exert an unbound Hobbit or discard 2 cards from hand to allow Birchseed to skirmish. Fellowship: Exert Birchseed to heal an unbound Hobbit.

card.name: Down From the Hills
card.text: Spell. Maneuver: Exert Gandalf 3 times to make an unbound companion with the Gandalf signet strength +5, defender +1, damage +2, and unable to take wounds until the regroup phase.

card.name: Forest Guardian
card.text: Unhasty. Assignment: Exert an unbound Hobbit or discard 2 cards from hand to allow this companion to skirmish.

card.name: Fury of the White Rider
card.text: Spell. Maneuver: Spot 3 twilight tokens and exert Gandalf to wound a minion twice.

card.name: ·Lindenroot, Elder Shepherd
card.text: Unhasty. Assignment: Exert an unbound Hobbit or discard 2 cards from hand to allow Lindenroot to skirmish. Skirmish: Exert Lindenroot to wound an {Isengard} minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Turn of the Tide
card.text: Spell. Maneuver: Exert Gandalf to discard up to 2 Shadow possessions. Any Shadow player may discard a minion to prevent this.

card.name: Be Back Soon
card.text: Maneuver: Discard Sméagol to discard a minion. An opponent may exert a minion twice to prevent this.

card.name: Evil-smelling Fens
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each site on the adventure path is a marsh. Shadow: Exert Gollum twice and discard this condition to play a minion from your discard pile.

card.name: Follow Sméagol
card.text: Plays on Sméagol. Regroup: Exert Sméagol or Gollum to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.name: ·Gollum, Nasty Treacherous Creature
card.text: Regroup: Discard Gollum to exert a companion or ally.

card.name: ·Gollum, Stinker
card.text: Gollum is strength +1 for each burden. Each time Gollum wins a skirmish, you may add a burden.

card.name: Look at Him
card.text: Shadow: Spot Sméagol or Gollum to add {1} for each burden.

card.name: Poor Wretch
card.text: Plays on Sméagol. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make Sméagol damage +1.

card.name: ·Sméagol, Old Noser
card.text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Regroup: Exert Sméagol (or Gollum) twice to reveal the top 4 cards of your draw deck. Wound a minion for each Shadow card revealed. Place those 4 cards beneath your draw deck in any order.

card.name: ·Sméagol, Slinker
card.text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Skirmish: Add a burden to make Sméagol strength +2 and take no wounds.

card.name: We Must Have It
card.text: Shadow: Play Gollum from your draw deck or discard pile. Skirmish: Discard a card at random from hand to make Gollum strength +3.

card.name: ·Alcarin, Warrior of Lamedon
card.text: Knight. The twilight cost of each other knight in your starting fellowship is -1. Assignment: Assign Alcarin to a minion bearing a {Gondor} fortification to heal Alcarin.

card.name: ·Citadel of the Stars
card.text: Fortification. Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert a {Gondor} Man or spot 3 knights to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a {Gondor} Man.

card.name: City Wall
card.text: Fortification. Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert a {Gondor} Man or spot 3 knights to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a {Gondor} Man.

card.name: Fall Back
card.text: Skirmish: Discard all Shadow cards borne by a minion bearing a {Gondor} fortification.

card.name: Knight of Gondor
card.text: Knight. Fellowship: Discard a {Gondor} condition to heal this companion.

card.name: Men of Númenor
card.text: Skirmish: Wound a minion bearing a {Gondor} fortification.

card.name: Rally Point
card.text: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Exert a knight to transfer a {Gondor} fortification borne by a minion to your support area.

card.name: ·Stone Tower
card.text: Fortification. Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert 2 {Gondor} Men to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a {Gondor} Man.

card.name: Take Cover
card.text: Fellowship: Exert a knight to play a {Gondor} fortification from your discard pile.

card.name: These Are My People
card.text: Fellowship: Exert Aragorn twice to play any number of possessions from your discard pile onto companions with the Aragorn signet.

card.name: ·Turgon, Man of Belfalas
card.text: Knight. To play, spot a knight. Maneuver: Exert Turgon to wound a minion bearing a {Gondor} fortification.

card.name: War Must Be
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Gondor} Man strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing a minion bearing a {Gondor} fortification).

card.name: Battering Ram
card.text: Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert an Uruk-hai to place an {Isengard} token on this card. Skirmish: Spot 5 companions and an {Isengard} token here to make an Uruk-hai damage +1. Discard this condition.

card.name: ·Berserk Rager
card.text: Damage +1. Berserk Rager is strength +1 for each wound on a character in its skirmish. Skirmish: Remove 3 {Isengard} tokens from a machine and exert Berserk Rager twice to wound every ally twice.

card.name: ·Berserk Savage
card.text: Damage +1. Berserk Savage is strength +1 for each wound on a character in its skirmish. Skirmish: Remove 4 {Isengard} tokens from a machine and exert Berserk Savage twice to make it strength +8.

card.name: ·Berserk Slayer
card.text: Damage +1. Berserk Slayer is strength +2 for each wound on a character in its skirmish. Skirmish: Remove 5 {Isengard} tokens from a machine and exert Berserk Slayer twice to wound every companion.

card.name: Black Shapes Crawling
card.text: Maneuver: Spot X Uruk-hai. The Free Peoples player may assign X wounds to your minions. Play X {Isengard} weapons from your discard pile.

card.name: ·Devilry of Orthanc
card.text: Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert an Uruk-hai to place an {Isengard} token on this card. Maneuver: Spot 8 {Isengard} tokens here to exert every character. Discard this condition.

card.name: ·Foul Horde
card.text: Warg-rider. While Foul Horde is not exhausted, it is fierce. While Foul Horde has at least 3 vitality, it is ambush {1}. While Foul Horde has at least 4 vitality, it is damage +1.

card.name: ·Gríma, Chief Counselor
card.text: Maneuver: Spot 4 Free Peoples cultures and exert Gríma to return an unbound companion, and all cards on him or her, to their owners' hands.

card.name: Isengard Flanker
card.text: Warg-rider. While this minion is not exhausted, he is fierce.

card.name: Isengard Rider
card.text: Warg-rider. While this minion is not exhausted, he is fierce.

card.name: Isengard Scimitar
card.text: Bearer must be an {Isengard} Orc. When you play this weapon, you may add {1} for each site you control.

card.name: Isengard Scout Troop
card.text: Warg-rider. While this minion is not exhausted, it is fierce. Each time an {Isengard} Orc wins a skirmish, you may exert this minion to control a site.

card.name: ·Saruman, Master of Foul Folk
card.text: Saruman may not take wounds during the archery phase and may not be assigned to a skirmish. Each time the fellowship moves, you may heal each {Isengard} Orc twice. Shadow: Exert Saruman to play an {Isengard} possession from your discard pile.

card.name: Scaling Ladder
card.text: Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert an Uruk-hai to place an {Isengard} token on this card. Skirmish: Spot an {Isengard} token here to heal an Uruk-hai. Discard this condition.

card.name: ·Sharku, Warg-captain
card.text: Warg-rider. While Sharku is not exhausted, he is fierce. Each time you play an {Isengard} mount, you may make the Free Peoples player exert a companion (except a Hobbit).

card.name: ·Sharku's Warg
card.text: Bearer must be a warg-rider. If bearer is Sharku, he is damage +1. Response: If a skirmish special ability is used in a skirmish involving bearer, exert bearer to cancel that action.

card.name: Siege Engine
card.text: Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Play an Uruk-hai to place an {Isengard} token on a machine. Response: If one or more machines are about to be discarded by an opponent, discard this condition to prevent that.

card.name: Uruk Engineer
card.text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may place an {Isengard} token on a machine.

card.name: Uruk Sapper
card.text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may place an {Isengard} token on a machine.

card.name: Uruk-hai Berserker
card.text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each wound on a character in its skirmish.

card.name: War-warg
card.text: Bearer must be a warg-rider. Response: If a skirmish special ability is used in a skirmish involving bearer, exert bearer to cancel that action.

card.name: Warg
card.text: Bearer must be a warg-rider. Response: If a skirmish special ability is used in a skirmish involving bearer, exert bearer to cancel that action.

card.name: Warg-master
card.text: Warg-rider. When you play this minion, you may play an {Isengard} mount from your discard pile. While this minion is not exhausted, he is fierce.

card.name: Warg-rider
card.text: Warg-rider. While this minion is not exhausted, he is fierce.

card.name: Wolf-voices
card.text: Skirmish: Make an {Isengard} Orc strength +2 (and heal it if mounted).

card.name: Wolves of Isengard
card.text: Plays on a plains site you control. Regroup: Exert an {Isengard} Orc to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.name: ·Army of Haradrim
card.text: Southron. Skirmish: Remove {3} to play a {Raider} mount from your discard pile.

card.name: Company of Haradrim
card.text: Southron. Regroup: Remove {9} and spot another Southron to make the move limit -1 for this turn (to a minimum of 1).

card.name: Desert Stalker
card.text: Southron. Ambush {2}. Maneuver: Exert this minion and spot 4 Free Peoples cultures to exert every companion.

card.name: Mûmak
card.text: Bearer must be a Southron. Bearer is fierce. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may add {2}.

card.name: Southron Marcher
card.text: Southron. Ambush {2}. While you can spot a Southron, this minion's twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Southron Runner
card.text: Southron. Ambush {2}. While you can spot a Southron, this minion's twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Southron Traveler
card.text: Southron. Ambush {2}. Response: If a Southron is about to take a wound, remove {3} to prevent that wound.

card.name: Strength in Numbers
card.text: To play, spot a Southron. Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Discard this condition to add {1} for each Man with ambush you spot.

card.name: War Mûmak
card.text: Bearer must be a Southron. Bearer is fierce. Each time bearer overwhelms a character, you may add {5}.

card.name: ·Armory
card.text: Fortification. Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Spot 2 {Rohan} Men to remove 2 tokens from a machine or to take a {Rohan} possession into hand from your discard pile. Discard this condition.

card.name: ·Arrow-slits
card.text: Fortification. Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Spot 2 {Rohan} Men to discard a possession or a machine. Discard this condition.

card.name: ·Ecglaf, Courageous Farmer
card.text: Villager. Fellowship: Exert Ecglaf and spot 2 valiant Men to play a {Rohan} possession from your discard pile.

card.name: ·Gamling, Warrior of Rohan
card.text: Valiant. To play, spot a {Rohan} Man. Skirmish: Play a {Rohan} possession on Gamling to make him strength +2 and damage +1.

card.name: I Am Here
card.text: Fellowship: Exert Théoden twice to heal every other companion with the Théoden signet twice.

card.name: Let Us Be Swift
card.text: Regroup: Spot 3 valiant Men to discard up to 2 conditions and liberate a site.

card.name: No Rest for the Weary
card.text: Maneuver: Spot 3 valiant Men to make one of those Men defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Parapet
card.text: Fortification. Plays to your support area. Archery: Spot 2 {Rohan} Men to remove 2 tokens from a machine or to make the minion archery total -3. Discard this condition.

card.name: Rohirrim Bow
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. Archery: Exert bearer and discard this possession to wound a minion.

card.name: Rohirrim Helm
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. Skirmish: Discard this possession to cancel a skirmish involving bearer. A minion in this skirmish may exert to prevent this.

card.name: Rohirrim Scout
card.text: Valiant. Regroup: Exert this companion and spot a {Rohan} possession to return that possession to hand.

card.name: Rohirrim Shield
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. The minion archery total is -1. Regroup: Discard this possession to heal bearer.

card.name: ·Sigewulf, Brave Volunteer
card.text: Villager. Regroup: Exert Sigewulf and spot 5 valiant Men to discard a minion.

card.name: ·Théoden, King of the Golden Hall
card.text: Valiant. Maneuver: Play a {Rohan} possession on Théoden to heal a {Rohan} ally.

card.name: Thundering Host
card.text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a mounted {Rohan} Man strength +3 (and heal that Man if at a plains).

card.name: ·Dead Marshes
card.text: Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 4{T}, Ring-bound companions skirmishing {Sauron} Orcs are strength -1. Maneuver: Spot 2 {Sauron} Orcs to play up to 2 {Sauron} conditions from your discard pile. Discard this condition.

card.name: Eye of Barad-Dûr
card.text: Skirmish: Make a companion or ally skirmishing a {Sauron} Orc strength -1 for each Ring-bound companion. Response: If a Free Peoples player reveals this card from your hand, discard this card to add 2 burdens.

card.name: Gate Soldier
card.text: When you play a {Sauron} condition, you may exert this minion and remove {2} to draw a card.

card.name: Gate Trooper
card.text: When you play this minion, you may exert him and spot 5 burdens to draw a card.

card.name: Gate Veteran
card.text: When you play this minion, you may exert him and spot 6 companions to draw a card.

card.name: ·Grishnákh, Orc Captain
card.text: Tracker. The site number of each {Sauron} Orc is -3. Shadow: Exert Grishnákh twice and spot another {Sauron} Orc to draw 3 cards. The Free Peoples player may add 2 burdens to prevent this.

card.name: I'd Make You Squeak
card.text: To play, exert 2 {Sauron} Orcs. Plays to your support area. The Shadow number of each site is +1 for each wound on a Hobbit (limit +3).

card.name: ·Morannon
card.text: Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of the first {Sauron} Orc played at site 4{T} is -3. Shadow: Spot 2 {Sauron} Orcs and discard 4 cards from hand to draw 3 cards. Discard this condition.

card.name: Orc Captain
card.text: When you play this minion, you may spot a {Sauron} condition to draw a card for each site you control (limit 3).

card.name: ·Orc Cutthroat
card.text: Tracker. The site number of each {Sauron} Orc is -3. Skirmish: Discard another {Sauron} Orc and exert Orc Cutthroat to wound a companion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Orc Fighter
card.text: Regroup: Spot a {Sauron} condition and exert this minion to take control of a site.

card.name: Orc Infantry
card.text: Regroup: Spot a {Sauron} condition and discard this minion to take control of a site.

card.name: ·Orc Patrol
card.text: Tracker. The site number of each {Sauron} Orc is -3. Maneuver: Exert Orc Patrol twice and spot another {Sauron} Orc to discard a condition.

card.name: Orc Pursuer
card.text: Tracker. The site number of each {Sauron} Orc is -1. When you play this minion, you may exert him and remove {2} to draw a card.

card.name: Orc Runner
card.text: Tracker. The site number of each {Sauron} Orc is -1. When you play this minion, you may exert him and discard 2 cards from hand to draw a card.

card.name: Teeth of Mordor
card.text: Plays to your support area. Regroup: Spot a {Sauron} Orc and remove {3} to stack that minion here. Shadow: Play a {Sauron} Orc stacked here as if played from hand.

card.name: ·Frodo, Master of the Precious
card.text: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). Fellowship: Add a burden to play Sméagol from your discard pile.

card.name: No Help for It
card.text: Regroup: Spot Sam and discard Sméagol or Gollum to remove 3 burdens.

card.name: No Use That Way
card.text: Skirmish: Add 3 burdens to wound a minion skirmishing a companion who has the Frodo signet twice.

card.name: ·Rare Good Ballast
card.text: Plays on Sam. Response: If a regroup special ability is used, discard Sméagol or Gollum to cancel that action.

card.name: ·Sam, Nice Sensible Hobbit
card.text: Ring-bound. While you can spot Frodo and Sméagol, Sam may not be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled. Response: If Frodo is killed, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.name: ·Sting, Baggins Heirloom
card.text: Bearer must be Frodo. Skirmish: Exert Frodo to make Sméagol strength +2 or Gollum strength -2.

card.name: You Must Help Us
card.text: Fellowship: Play Sméagol from your discard pile to heal each Ring-bound Hobbit twice.

card.name: Hornburg Wall
card.text: Regroup: Spot your minion and remove {9} to make the fellowship move again this turn (if the move limit allows).

card.name: Nan Curunír
card.text: Plains. Response: If your mounted minion is about to take a wound, remove {2} to prevent that wound.

card.name: Caverns of Isengard
card.text: Underground. The Free Peoples player wins the game only if the Ring-bearer survives until Shadow players reconcile.

card.name: ·Legolas, Archer of Mirkwood
card.text: Archer. Each time Legolas wins a skirmish, you may heal a Dwarf companion or another Elf companion.

card.name: ·Éowyn, Daughter of Éomund
card.text: Valiant. Maneuver: Play a {Rohan} possession on Éowyn to heal her.

card.name: Baruk Khazâd
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf to wound a minion. You may take the next maneuver action.

card.name: Break the Charge
card.text: Archery: Exert 3 Elf companions to make the fellowship archery total +2.

card.name: ·Foul Horde
card.text: Warg-rider. While Foul Horde is not exhausted, it is fierce. While Foul Horde has at least 3 vitality, it is ambush {1}. While Foul Horde has at least 4 vitality, it is damage +1.

card.name: ·Army of Haradrim
card.text: Southron. Skirmish: Remove {3} to play a {Raider} mount from your discard pile.

card.name: Rohirrim Helm
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. Skirmish: Discard this possession to cancel a skirmish involving bearer. A minion in this skirmish may exert to prevent this.

card.name: Thundering Host
card.text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a mounted {Rohan} Man strength +3 (and heal that Man if at a plains).
